mapper.select: SELECT mt.idx_messageroom, IF (mt.receiver = #{param1}, mt.sender, mt.receiver) AS other_email, MAX(mh.send_datetime) AS reg_date, (SELECT et.emp_name FROM employee_tb et WHERE et.idx_employee = other_email) AS name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message_history_tb mh WHERE mh.idx_messageroom = mt.idx_messageroom AND ((mt.sender = #{param1} AND mt.is_sender_exit = 'N') OR (mt.receiver = #{param1} AND mt.is_receiver_exit = 'N')) ) AS msg_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message_history_tb mh WHERE mh.idx_messageroom = mt.idx_messageroom AND mt.receiver = #{param1} AND mh.is_receiver_read = 'N' AND mh.sender = other_email ) AS no_read FROM messageroom_tb mt LEFT JOIN message_history_tb mh ON mt.idx_messageroom = mh.idx_messageroom WHERE mt.sender = #{param1} OR mt.receiver = #{param1} GROUP BY mt.idx_messageroom, other_email ORDER BY reg_date DESC;
